channel.title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 3 on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Mikaela Hoover Talks ‘Superman,’ Cat Grant’s Clark Kent Crush and 17 Years of James Gunn Team-Ups
item.description: The longtime Gunn collaborator also has the second seasons of ‘One Piece’ and ‘Beef’ on the way.
